title: PBE Update not working ! - Error Code 003 Something is up with our servers
body:
Hey guys... I can't update my PBE client since 3 days now...
It always says "Something is up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching. We're giving it another shot.
In the meantime, you can check the status of our server here. (Error code 003)
Do I have to install PBE again or is there another way to solve the problem? 
Please help me !
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
I'd try troubleshooting your connection really quickly juuuust to make sure that something isn't blocking your network from talking with the PBE servers. Make sure your firewalls and antivirus are turned off temporarily while updating, or be sure to add exceptions for League's PBE servers with the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you aren't sure how. 

If it doesn't help, be sure to post over on the PBE boards for a little better help! I don't personally deal with PBE too much, but it really sounds like something could just be blocking your access to those specific servers.

Troubleshooting?
Btw there is no problem with my firewall or Avira :/
Turned off both/added exception

Any other way to help me out ? Or do I have to install howl client again?

With my normal Euw Client everything's fine
